amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute clarifies that persons who help at food banks on a volunteer basis and receive groceries from the food bank are not considered employees of the food bank.
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Ballenger.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ballenger amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
